CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_info (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "ready" BOOLEAN, "structureVersion" VARCHAR, "version" VARCHAR, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure
INSERT INTO _content_info VALUES ('checksum_content', false, 'M3rMTazWrA8W9e78nfjdCWFIBkq8M4osVHo3UAPj75Y', 'v3.5.0--VhKp9b2FWau9H_Z_CSRWJ7hiTNKcY4BikdhubeILBy8', '7uuRgwPXIae_fFhuf2jqes_eOoLx6CYoRrqiYql5LXc'); -- meta
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _content_content; -- structure
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_content (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "title" VARCHAR, "body" TEXT, "cover" VARCHAR NULL, "date" VARCHAR NULL, "description" VARCHAR, "draft" BOOLEAN DEFAULT false, "extension" VARCHAR, "meta" TEXT, "navigation" TEXT DEFAULT true, "path" VARCHAR, "seo" TEXT DEFAULT '{}', "stem" VARCHAR, "tags" TEXT NULL, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure
